The capital city is Keren. The region is named after the Anseba River. ==Administration== The region is divided in ten subregions: *Adi Tekelezan Subregion *Asmat Subregion *Elabered Subregion *Geleb Subregion *Hagaz Subregion *Halhal Subregion *Habero Subregion *Keren Subregion *Kerkebet Subregion *Sela Subregion Category:Regions of Eritrea
title: Anseba Region
